typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_corrupt_record} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	backslashEscape: true) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(value),
	mapColumn(
		context = {@odata.context},
		{@odata.type} = value.{@odata.type},
		{@odata.id} = value.{@odata.id},
		{@odata.editLink} = value.{@odata.editLink},
		Id = value.Id,
		DateCreated = value.DateCreated,
		DateModified = value.DateModified,

		DateaTimeOccur = value.DateaTimeOccur,

		CompanyNameR = value.CompanyNameR,
		CompanyPhone = value.CompanyPhone,
		CostofIncident = value.CostofIncident,
		County = value.County,
		DateClosed = value.DateClosed,
		DateReptoEmp = value.DateReptoEmp,
		DateReviewed = value.DateReviewed,
		DateSentInvest = value.DateSentInvest,
		DatInvestigated = value.DatInvestigated,
		detailsinvesbel = value.detailsinvesbel,

		ImmCorrActTaken = value.ImmCorrActTaken,
		ImportRecNo = value.ImportRecNo,
		IncidentHelper = value.IncidentHelper,
		IncidentValid = value.IncidentValid,
		InjPartWho = value.InjPartWho,
		InjurePartyText = value.InjurePartyText,
		InvestCompleted = value.InvestCompleted,
		InvestigResults = value.InvestigResults,
		InvestReq = value.InvestReq,
		InvestTeam = value.InvestTeam,
		InvolinIncident = value.InvolinIncident,

		TargClosingDate = value.TargClosingDate,
		TargetDate = value.TargetDate,
		TIIInvRequired = value.TIIInvRequired,
		TimofOccNew = value.TimofOccNew,
		Township = value.Township,
		Witnessesadetai = value.Witnessesadetai,
		WitnessFName = value.WitnessFName,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
